ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A friend of mine got the drum last night but sold it before I had a chance to test it.  270pp (yes, two hundred and seventy platinum).  It was enough for
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 30 Jun 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> I have the lute, and did not notice any difference when i first gotten it,
> though i have not tested recently. You never know it could have an effect
> in the future, so its good to have. I heard the battle drum you get from
> Mistmoore has an increased percussion effect too, but I do not have it yet.

A friend of mine got the drum last night but sold it before I
had a chance to test it. 270pp (yes, two hundred and seventy
platinum). It was enough for him to drop what he was doing,
and hop the boat over to deliver the drum to the purchaser.
Maybe it *does* have an increased effect.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
